title: OGX Conditioner, Repairing Awapuhi Ginger, 13oz
description: This exclusive formula repairs brittle, frizzy, unruly hair by penetrating each shaft with moisture. It's the best remedy for repairing, mending and adding silky softness to even the driest, damaged hair.

title: OGX Shampoo, Repairing Awapuhi Ginger, 13oz
description: Indulge in a lavish, moisturizing creamy formula infused with the Hawaiian beauty secret of nutrient rich awapuhi ginger extract to instantly mend and soften dry, coarse hair while stimulating the scalp with freshness, rich keratin proteins fortify each strand creating restored, soft, strengthened hair from the inside out.

title: OGX Shampoo, Anti-Breakage Keratin Oil, 13oz
description: Indulge in rich, fortifying keratin proteins that reinforce each strand, increasing elasticity to resist breakage caused by brushing and styling, while argan oil conditions and smoothes creating a luminescent shine. Strands are strengthened from within and nourished throughout for longer, stronger hair.
